ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:21:24 [Issue ID 4000-670663] urn:comicvine:4000-670663 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:01:23. [Issue ID 1822493]
ComicInfo.Summary:
As the two Vampblade’s try to work together to get the classic Katie we all know and love back to her home dimension, they must battle previously defeated foes. But things might not play out the way they expect the second time around!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including two covers from Dan Mendoza (Zombie Tramp, DollFace)!!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|----------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Marcelo Costa | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Costa | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Daniel Salcedo | 3 | | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Daniel Salcedo | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 6 |
*Notes* Overall issue #28. The digital edition (5/23/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Down the Vamp Hole Part Three
